entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
